data.author: S & S

changelog.release_notes:
Updated for firmware 3.8.
(disabled display reverse mode)

- Added "Baby Monitor" feature
(see help online)

remember to update companion app.

- Added a "Fast Call" function to call your preferred numbers with a long click on Pebble
(see the companion app)

-  Added on watchapp menu the timers entry
  -  various bug fixes
Fixed bugs about wrong management ON/OFF of various functions
Fixed bugs about wrong management ON/OFF of various functions

- add alert for phone battery low (< 5%)
 - minor bug fixes

- add custom day of week abbreviations
- fix font size for day of week and day of month
- minor bug fixes

data.description:
More for your Pebble

- "Baby Monitor" to monitor with your Pebble the sleep of your baby within bluetooth range.
- Fast Call to your preferred numbers with a long click (*)
- Timers:
  - 2 predefined quick timers (*)
  - 1 Custom timer
- Large Clock and Date
- Functions:
     "Shake to light" only during custom period
     Find your phone: play notification on phone(*)
     Display face in reverse mode
     Show/hide seconds
     Display your GPS speed (*)
     Sleep time:
           -turn off/on bluetooth on phone
           -hide seconds
- Indicator for:
     Pebble battery status
     Phone battery status (*)
     Bluetooth connection status
     SMS unread (*)
     Missed Calls (*)
     Phone volume status (*)
     Time to your next Calendar Event (*)
 - Alerts with vibrations:
     on Pebble connected
     on Pebble disconnected
     every hour
     on phone battery below 5% (*)

(*) only with free companion app for Android!
data.title: More for your Pebble
